name: Astro
stats: (3) Astro Champions reduce their mana costs by 30

name: Battlecast
desc: Battlecast champions, upon dealing or taking 10 instances of damage, heal if below half health, or deal magic damage to the nearest enemy if above half.

name: Celestial
desc: All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

name: Chrono
desc: All allies gain 15% Attack Speed every some seconds.

name: Cybernetic
desc: Cybernetic champions with at least one item gain Health and Attack Damage.

name: Dark Star
desc: When any ally champion dies, all other allied Dark Star Champions gain Attack Damage and Spell Power

name: Mech-Pilot
desc: The Super-Mech has the traits of its pilots, 3random items from among them and gains 60% of the combined pilot's health and attack damage When the Super-Mech dies the Piots are ejected with 35% of thier maximun health and continue of fight
stats: (3) At the start of combat, three random mech-pilots are teleported into a super-mech

name: Rebel
desc: At the start of combat, Rebels gain a shield and increased damage for each adjacent Rebel. The shield lasts for 8 seconds.

name: Space Pirate
desc: Whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow on a Champion there is a chance to drop extra loot.
stats: (4) 50% for 1 gold and 25% for a component item

name: Star Guardian
desc: Star Guardians' spellcasts grant Mana to other Star Guardians spread among them.

name: Blademaster
desc: Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger two additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

name: Blaster
desc: Every fourth Basic Attack from a Blaster fires additional attacks at random enemies. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks, trigger on-hit effects and can critically hit.

name: Demolitionist
stats: (2) Damage from Demolitionists' spellcasts stun their for 1.50 seconds. (Once per spellcast)

name: Infiltrator
desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline. Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for 6 seconds at the start of combat, refreshes on takedown

name: Mana-Reaver
stats: (2) Mana-Reaver attacks increase the mana cost of their targetâ€™s next spell by 40%

name: Mercenary
stats: (1) Innate: Upgrades for Mercenaries's spells have a chance to appear in the shop.

name: Paragon
stats: (1) Ally Star Guardian basic attacks are converted to true damage. All other ally basic attacks are converted to magic damage.

name: Protector
desc: Protectors shield themselves for 4 seconds whenever they cast a spell. This shield doesn't stack.

name: Sniper
desc: Snipers deal increased damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

name: Sorcerer
desc: All allies have increased Spell Power.

name: Starship
stats: (1) Innate: Starships gain 40 Mana per second, maneuver around the board, and are immune to movement impairing effects, but can't Basic Attack.
